info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 6:03PM CDT until November 04 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DELTA AND SOUTHEASTERN LAMAR COUNTIES... At 603 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Bogata, or 11 miles northwest of Hagansport, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Pattonville, Deport, Taylor Town, Clardy, Milton, Cunningham and Minter. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
